Question
========

Which of the following is a description of lexical scoping?

Answerlist
----------

* value of names are looked up based on how the function is called
* relating to words in a dictionary
* the scoping rules use a run-time structure
* value of names are looked up based on how the function is defined

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* No, the value names are based on how the function is defined.
* No, that's not about programming.
* No, it's not based on run-time.
* Correct.
